short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on a stealthy adventure with Assassin's Creed, featuring bold visuals and convenient shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the world of Assassin's Creed with vivid, action-packed visuals of iconic settings and characters.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by the stealth and strategy of the Assassin’s Creed universe, designed for seamless browsing.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date with a stylish display that fits perfectly into the Assassin’s Creed theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites with customizable shortcuts.
🎮 Play Games: Access thrilling Assassin’s Creed-inspired games straight from your new tab.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your selected search engine, enhancing your browsing experience.
🚀 More Extension: Unlock additional features and expand your browsing capabilities with Assassin’s Creed-themed tools.
